# sensor

**Instance Property**

The particular sensor that this object reads.

## Declaration

```swift
var sensor: SRSensor { get }
```

## Discussion

The framework sets this property to the sensor you pass into [doc://com.apple.sensorkit/documentation/SensorKit/SRSensorReader/init(sensor:)].

## Creating a sensor reader

- **init(sensor:)**: Initializes a new sensor reader object.
- **SRSensor**: The sensors an app can read.
